meanings.definition: Having three lobes or segments, as a cross
meanings.sent1: The botonee design on the shield was intricate.
meanings.sent2: The botonee pattern added a unique touch to the fabric.
meanings.sent3: The botonee shape on the cake made it look like a fancy flower.
meanings.sent4: Her botonee hairstyle with three braids was eye-catching.
meanings.sent5: The botonee leaves on the tree created a beautiful silhouette against the sky.

meanings.definition: A cross with arms terminating in three rounded lobes
meanings.sent1: The church displayed a botonee at the altar.
meanings.sent2: The botonee hung on the wall as a symbol of faith.
meanings.sent3: The botonee pendant sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: She wore a botonee necklace that had been passed down for generations.
meanings.sent5: The botonee on the stained glass window glowed in the afternoon light.
